mapper.select: SELECT s.showing_seat_cnt - (SELECT count(*) FROM show_seat ss WHERE s.showing_seq = ss.showing_seq AND show_seat_status = 'N') AS remaining_seats FROM showing s WHERE s.showing_seq = #{showing_seq};

SELECT p.play_name, p.play_major_cat, p.play_middle_cat, p.play_run_time, p.play_poster, p.play_info, p.agency_id, sc.seat_price, (SELECT stg.stage_name FROM showing s JOIN stage stg ON s.stage_id = stg.stage_id WHERE s.play_id = p.play_id GROUP BY stg.stage_name) stage_name FROM play p JOIN seat_class sc ON p.play_id = sc.play_id WHERE p.play_id = #{play_id};
SELECT showing_date, showing_info FROM showing s WHERE s.play_id = #{play_id} ORDER BY showing_date;
